answers.answer: Hi,For all people, normal is as follows:fasting for atleast 8 hours: less than 100mg/dLWithin 2 hours after a meal: less than 140mg/dLThere are some in between values that are considered pre-diabetes, but those are the absolute normals listed above.

Hi,For all people, normal is as follows:fasting for atleast 8 hours: less than 100mg/dLWithin 2 hours after a meal: less than 140mg/dLThere are some in between values that are considered pre-diabetes, but those are the absolute normals listed above.

question: I WAS JUST WONDERING WHAT NUMBER IS CONSIDERD HIGH IF A PERSON HAS NEVER HAD DIABETES AND THINK THAT THERE SUGAR MIGHT BE TO HIGH? I DONT KNOW WHAT A NORMAL READING WOULD BE.
title: DIABETIC NUMBER READINGS
